title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 768.4 - Governing authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 768.4 - Governing authority

State Regulations

The governing authority of any certified home health
agency participating in an approved respite demonstration project pursuant to
section
131-p
of
the Social Services Law shall: (a) appoint a staff member as coordinator of respite services who shall have, in
addition to other agency duties, the responsibility for the coordination of
respite services with other patient services provided by the agency; and
(b) provide respite services in
such agency only to persons medically eligible for admission to such
agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
768.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
